body:
Hello @jbrockmendel! Thanks for submitting the PR.

 - There are no PEP8 issues in the file [`pandas/core/arrays/datetimelike.py`](https://github.com/jbrockmendel/pandas/blob/12e0f4ee38c80e0f1d1b33a92976f1ce9fd196b1/pandas/core/arrays/datetimelike.py) !

 - There are no PEP8 issues in the file [`pandas/core/arrays/datetimes.py`](https://github.com/jbrockmendel/pandas/blob/12e0f4ee38c80e0f1d1b33a92976f1ce9fd196b1/pandas/core/arrays/datetimes.py) !

 - There are no PEP8 issues in the file [`pandas/tests/indexes/datetimes/test_construction.py`](https://github.com/jbrockmendel/pandas/blob/12e0f4ee38c80e0f1d1b33a92976f1ce9fd196b1/pandas/tests/indexes/datetimes/test_construction.py) !

 - There are no PEP8 issues in the file [`pandas/tests/indexes/datetimes/test_date_range.py`](https://github.com/jbrockmendel/pandas/blob/12e0f4ee38c80e0f1d1b33a92976f1ce9fd196b1/pandas/tests/indexes/datetimes/test_date_range.py) !

 - There are no PEP8 issues in the file [`pandas/tests/indexes/datetimes/test_indexing.py`](https://github.com/jbrockmendel/pandas/blob/12e0f4ee38c80e0f1d1b33a92976f1ce9fd196b1/pandas/tests/indexes/datetimes/test_indexing.py) !

 - There are no PEP8 issues in the file [`pandas/tests/indexes/period/test_indexing.py`](https://github.com/jbrockmendel/pandas/blob/12e0f4ee38c80e0f1d1b33a92976f1ce9fd196b1/pandas/tests/indexes/period/test_indexing.py) !

 - There are no PEP8 issues in the file [`pandas/tests/indexes/timedeltas/test_indexing.py`](https://github.com/jbrockmendel/pandas/blob/12e0f4ee38c80e0f1d1b33a92976f1ce9fd196b1/pandas/tests/indexes/timedeltas/test_indexing.py) !

 - There are no PEP8 issues in the file [`pandas/tests/tseries/offsets/test_offsets.py`](https://github.com/jbrockmendel/pandas/blob/12e0f4ee38c80e0f1d1b33a92976f1ce9fd196b1/pandas/tests/tseries/offsets/test_offsets.py) !

 - There are no PEP8 issues in the file [`pandas/tseries/offsets.py`](https://github.com/jbrockmendel/pandas/blob/12e0f4ee38c80e0f1d1b33a92976f1ce9fd196b1/pandas/tseries/offsets.py) !

Azure fail is in developer.rst, unrelated.
@datapythonista is the azure fail caused by something in this PR?  It looks unrelated but re-pushing didn’t fix it.

master was broken (I merged an old PR that didn't have some linting), but it's been fixed in #24160

If you merge master and push again, the CI should pass now.

> pls add to #6581 for the deprecation

Will do.  Actually, is this private enough that a deprecation cycle is unnecessary?  If so we should just remove the arg now and move the whole func to arrays.datetimes, since that is the only place it is used
@TomAugspurger does this step on your toes?
